p: SK‐M., YS‐T., KI‐H., M.Ito., AT, HH, NI, TN, NW, MK, EA, DJ, HY, and M. Imai have no competing interests. MY has received speaker's honoraria from Daiichi Sankyo Co., Ltd. YK has received speaker's honoraria from Toyama Chemical and Astellas, Inc; grant support from Daiichi Sankyo Pharmaceutical, Toyama Chemical, Shionogi & Co., Ltd., and Kyoritsu Seiyaku; and is a founder of FluGen.
